dadjokes:
You can use *mv* to rename a file trough your terminal.
mv old-file-name new-file-name

Linux has a photoshop alternative that's free.
sudo apt install gimp

You can get a readable machine specification output with Neofetch!
sudo apt install neofetch

To edit sound files you can use Audacity.
sudo apt install audacity

If after instalation your music files won't play use this command in your terminal:
sudo apt-get install mint-meta-codecs
Do not forget to make regular backups/snapshots of your system!

You can update your system trough the terminal too!
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade
